text: In mein se kuch log aise hain jo kaan laga kar tumhari baat sunte hain aur phir jab tumhare paas se nikalte hain un logon se jinhein ilm ki niyamat bakshi gayi hai puchte hain ke abhi abhi inhon ne kya kaha tha?yeh woh log hain jinke dilon par Allah ne thappa (seal) laga diya hai aur yeh apni apni khwaishat ke pairo bane huey hain
